lines.text: It's my life! and I'll live it the way I want! Upside down, catty-corner or slidin' down a pole!
Eighty Three descendants, all of them women, except some wear pants. Isn't that right?
I imagine they were Mr. and Mrs. O'Neill.
After all, Rome wasn't burnt in a day, you know.
Well, I'll see ya in church!
